so_35623462: #!/bin/bash
array[0]="file1.sdf"
array[1]="file2.sdf"
array[2]="file3.sdf"
array[3]="file4.sdf"

size=${#array[@]}
index=$(($RANDOM % $size))
echo ${array[$index]}

so_41399116: #!/bin/bash

t=27                                # number of items in the array
n=3                                 # number of items to be chosen
a1=( $(shuf --input-range=1-"$t") )
printf '%3s ' "${a1[@]}"; echo

#!/bin/bash

t=27                                    # number of items in the array
n=3                                     # number of items to be chosen
a1=( $(shuf --input-range=1-"$t") )

while ((i+n<=t)); do
    printf '%3s ' "${a1[@]:i:n}"; echo
    ((i+=n))
done
